address_scope.description: Set address scope associated with the subnet pool (name or ID), prefixes must be unique across address scopes

default.description: Set this as a default subnet pool

default_prefix_length.description: Set subnet pool default prefix length

default_quota.description: Set default quota for subnet pool as the number ofIP addresses allowed in a subnet

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

max_prefix_length.description: Set subnet pool maximum prefix length

min_prefix_length.description: Set subnet pool minimum prefix length

name.description: Name of the new subnet pool

no_default.description: Set this as a non-default subnet pool

no_share.description: Set this subnet pool as not shared

no_tag.description: No tags associated with the subnet pool

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

pool_prefix.description: Set subnet pool prefixes (in CIDR notation) (repeat option to set multiple prefixes)

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

share.description: Set this subnet pool as shared

tag.description: Tag to be added to the subnet pool (repeat option to set multiple tags)
